portal_room.name: portal_room
portal_room.description: Your eyes open. You stand in front of a pedastle covered with a black shrowd. Upon the pedastle there lies a straw doll with a rough canvas robe. Its robes are covered in thin black text that you cannot decipher

cell.name: cell
cell.description: you are in a dimly lit cell. Light is streaming through the keyhole
